The methods of developing concentration are: a) Not to bring up any outside thought in Salaat, b) Perform Salaat with all the Sunan and Aadab, c) Focus on the words of the Qiraat, Tasbeehaat, etc. d) Imagine you are offering this Salaat to your Creator.%0D%0A%0D%0A3.
